data.title: Great shrimp tacos and burritos
data.text: Small, cozy, comfortable, not fancy restaurant in downtown Ventura.  Reasonably priced.  Nice place to just hang out and enjoy your food with a beer.  The tacos were so good that I came back the next night to try a burrito.

data.title: Great tacos & burritos
data.text: Love their fish and chicken tacos the most.  Burritos are very good, good rice, refried beans are yummy, prices are reasonable, good salsa bar.

data.title: Great taco spot!
data.text: We were looking for one final fish/shrimp taco spot on our way out of town and we enjoyed Snapper Jack's. Both the fish and shrimp tacos were delicious and the special sauce really added great flavor. They have a lot of salsas to choose from at the salsa bar. Their menu is really extensive - worth a quick stop and better than Chipotle-style restaurants.

data.title: Sad Excuse for Fish Tacos
data.text: I try not to write bad reviews.  I will often try a place multiple times if something is off the first time.  This story is the opposite.  Snapper Jacks started out great.  My first trip a few yeas ago yielded fresh hot grilled fish, cabbage and a crispy shell.  The last two visits the food was almost inedible.  On my last visit, the fish tasted very fishy with a slight hint of ammonia.  On top of that the piece was so small it was really a cabbage taco. The shell was not crispy but rather limp and oily.  The condiment table was incomplete with three of the sauces at our near empty.  The staff seemed lackluster.  I will not be back,

data.title: Shack sauce
data.text: Their crunchy steak tacos are the best! If you're trying to eat a bit healthier, their quinoa bowl is amazing. & everything only gets better with their shack sauce.

data.title: Cool place with a nice vibe
data.text: First time having fish tacos. The staff was friendly and the food was fresh. They played some pretty good oldies and the decor was nice

data.title: Hair in my nachos
data.text: Took the hair to the guy at the counter he said "okay". I was not upset about it but the Okay is not okay . I'm sorry about that would've worked

data.title: Yuck!
data.text: Sometimes I won't review after a bad first visit but my burrito was disgusting.  I ordered a steak flajita burrito.  The taste was so bad I threw it away.  Like too much cumin or curry with the taste of burnt milk mixed with processed American cheese.  The burrito was mushy and impossible to hold.  People who work here should be forced to eat the food.  I can't return.

data.title: Great...
data.text: We had 2 burritos, one very plain, one with just about everything.  Both were excellent.  Guac was ok, not great.  Chips were ok, not salted enough for my taste, but still crispy and not greasy.  Salsa bar had great selection.  Thought it was a little pricy ($22).  But good food.

data.title: GREAT FISH TACOS!
data.text: I LOVED this place. And I'm glad I shared the taco platter with a friend because these fish tacos are bigger than at other places, packed full of big fish chunks and yummy veggies. It might be "fast food" but it's made from scratch, fresh and a very good value.

data.title: Real Mexican American
data.text:
Great food I loved the nacho cheese with beef wow👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 
Salsa 🌶 wonderful . Place is very clean, friendly staff. Would definitely recommend it to anyone and will visit there more often for more Mexican food... Love this place 👍👍👍

data.title: Worst fish taco in Ventura
data.text: Great customer service, but the food was just terrible. The crab was off and the fish was burnt. Came all the way from Indiana to get a California fish taco and We were highly disappointed with it having such great reviews.

data.title: Hungry
data.text: I've known the manager when he was a waiter he's come along way. Service is great. The kitchen manager is top of his kitchen. Great variety, affordable.

data.title: Always Busy = DELICIOUS
data.text: I love the potato and fish tacos.  The beans can't be beat. The salsa bar is always clean and salsas are made fresh.  A local favorite. Great Mexican-style fast food.

data.title: Superb Mexican Food Fast
data.text:
This food is surprisingly good. This place may remind you of a fast food take-out place but is much much more. I would compare it to a full blown Mexican restaurant, maybe because they are connected with Yolanda's Mexican restaurant.  I really like the décor of this restaurant-it is unique and fun. It takes you back to your childhood, especially if you rode a bike, skateboarded or surfed.
One of my favorites is the "Potato Tacos", m-m-m-m-m good. Enchiladas are also great.
There are a few of these "Snapper Jacks" around. I like the one next to the college. The one next to the downtown theatre is convenient especially if your seeing a movie.

data.title: REALLY GREAT FOOD
data.text: Ate here while on a short visit to Ventura from the UK. You go up to the Food Bar and order and then they serve it to you. I had the Chicken Caesar Salad Taco which was enormous (in fact couldn't eat all of it as was too full). Very good value and quick service. Situated in Telegraph Road.

data.title: Almost Fast Food
data.text: All the food we have tried here has been really good. The Tacos, all types, are great! I think I like the fish tacos best. You order at the counter then they bring it to your table. They have a good selection of salsas and other goodies and the service is great and pretty fast. Our whole family loves to eat here!

data.title: Great Fast Food!
data.text: I rarely will ever go to a fast food restaurant, but decided to give this a try because I did not want a huge meal that normal sit down restaurants serve plus this was not a chain restaurant.  Found this place just walking down the street.  It was very clean inside and the menu had a good variety of choices.  The restaurant was  a beach and surf theme.  I had the Chicken Caesar Salad.  My daughter had the Taco Salad and my husband had the chicken Fajita Burrito.  We all thought the food was great and reasonably priced. We will definitely be back the next time we are in Ventura.

data.title: First Visit Good, would visit again
data.text: I tried one shrimp and one grilled fish taco. They were reasonably tasty. Portions were good size, refried beans nice, rice ambivalent. Salsa bar good as most reviews state. Hot salsa was relatively hot, which is good as I like spicy. Good variety of salsa as well. I will give it another go, perhaps a chicken and fried fish taco next time.

data.title: Everything was good
data.text: Took family for daughters soccer tournament at the college & ate here since it was close. Very good & fresh food with reasonable pricing! I had grilled fish tacos, hubby had nachos, kids had taquitos, reg tacos & salad... All very good! ( yes I tasted everyone's plate). I highly recommend if you are in the area. Oh & salsa is delicious!
